definition: May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: China has followed the West selectively since the May 4th Movement in 1919.
sentences.chinese: 自1919五四運動起，中國選擇性地尾隨西方。

sentences.english: The Chinese Youth Day commemorates the May 4th Movement thar happened in 1919.
sentences.chinese: 中國青年節是紀念1919年發生的五四運動的日子。

sentences.english: The May Fourth Movement against imperialism and feudalism broke out in Beijing in1919.
sentences.chinese: 反帝反封建的五四運動於一九一九年在北京爆發。

sentences.english: The May 4th Movement signifies a new period in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 五四運動標誌着中國歷史上一個新的時期。

sentences.english: It was part of the world proletarian revolution of the time.
sentences.chinese: 五四運動是當時無產階級世界革命的一部分。

sentences.english: The Chinese people came into contact with Marxism-Leninism after the may Fouth movement.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民在五四運動後開始接觸到馬克思列寧主義。

sentences.english: This process begins from after May 4th Movement, in which the historical requisition had been provided.
sentences.chinese: 這一進程是在五四運動後開啓的。

sentences.english: Peking University was at the centre of the May 4th Movement.
sentences.chinese: 北京大學是“五四運動”的中心。

sentences.english: In 1919, the May 4th Movement took place in China.
sentences.chinese: 一九一九年，中國發生了五四運動。

sentences.english: Beida students led the May 4 movement for reforms 90 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 北大學生在90年前領導了旨在改革國家的五四運動。

sentences.english: It's said his grandfather took part in the May 4th Movement.
sentences.chinese: 據說他的爺爺參加過五四運動。

sentences.english: The fifth part is the "Weekly Review" reported on May Fourth Movement process.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分是《每週評論》對五四運動進程的報道。

sentences.english: The May 4th Movement was an anti-imperialist as well as an anti-feudal movement.
sentences.chinese: 反帝反封建的五四運動於一九一九年在北京爆發。

sentences.english: Around May-4(superscript th) Movement, the debates between doctrine of Confucius and westernization occurred.
sentences.chinese: 五四運動前後，出現了孔化和西化的辯論。

sentences.english: How to carry forward the spirit of the “May Fourth Movement”?
sentences.chinese: 如何真正弘揚五四運動精神？

sentences.english: The May 4th Movement is a sign for a new period in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 五四運動是中國歷史上一個新時期的標誌。

definition: the New Culture Movement (mid-1910s and 1920s), intellectual revolution against Confucianism aiming to introduce Western elements, especially democracy and science
to work part time while studying/work-study program
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
